name: Midorikawa Hana (Prison School)
description:
V2 Description

I'll probably have to redo it sometime in future since I'm not really satisfied, but for now it's an upgrade. Previews have been made with weight 1.0 and it's more compatible thatn V1.

I've changed tagging here to more detailed so now full prompt is midorikawa hana, brown jacket, neck ribbon, collared shirt, school uniform, plaid skirt, loafers.

Additionally:

  • you can optionally add (shorts, shorts under skirt), through you might have to struggle a bit to make them longer like in the series.

  • striped panties works best for underwear ^_^

  • prison clothes, striped shirt, striped pants works for prison outfit, but design is pretty random. Can add midriff if that's what you want. If you get blue stripes on pants (which I'm guessing happens because of panties) you can add blue pants to negatives.

  • eyes looks more generic than V1, but adding squinting helps somewhat. I actually really like V1 eyes, but looking back at the dataset, it was kind of fluke.

  • I recommend trying out ahegao loras with it :D

V1 Description

My second Lora, this time for Hana from Prison School. Seems to work best with weight between 0.7 and 1.0 (lower end for full body).

Add phrase midorikawa hana to make it work. I also add school uniform, shirt for proper clothes. You might have to add brown eyes sometimes if they turn too redish.

modelVersions.name: V2
trainedWords: brown jacket, neck ribbon, collared shirt, school uniform, plaid skirt, loafers
prison clothes, striped shirt, striped pants
modelVersions.description:
Pros:

  • Works better on default weight and more compatible.

  • Shorts under skirt works (although not completely accurate)

  • Prison outfit works (through not with consistent desing)

Cons:

  • Eyes are more generic, squinting in prompt helps.
